link.title: DragonWeb new site with no CMS. What madness is this?

entry.content:
New site with no CMS, what madness is this?! Simple answer is Jekyll

Static website means no database, no content management system - which makes your site faster & more secure.

  • Blog post are done with markdown.
  • Instant search is done with a Vue.js
  • sitemap.xml is generated with Jekyll.

Fun fact - Jekyll was used Barack Obama website.
